data.lyric:
[ti:Behind Barz (Bonus(Explicit))]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Top Boy (A Selection of Music Inspired by the Series)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Behind Barz (Bonus|Explicit) - Drake
[00:11.28]Lyrics by：A. Graham
[00:22.57]Yeah look
[00:27.57]You know how the paigon chit-chat goes
[00:29.24]I like Rs and Vs and Os
[00:30.92]I don't really play no tic-tac-toe
[00:32.59]Been with Chubbs through highs and lows
[00:34.25]We seen man last night they froze
[00:35.97]Wasn't no cameras wasn't no pose
[00:37.66]Just like that one time at 'Chella
[00:39.37]Good thing man weren't pullin' out phones
[00:41.01]Staying in big six-six with woes
[00:42.72]Man start dissin' and doin' reposts
[00:44.43]They do anything except road
[00:46.07]Still can't see them after it snows
[00:47.77]I don't have time for the wasteman jokes
[00:49.45]Personal ting if I'm gettin' up close
[00:51.12]Loyal to O 'cause I've taken a oath
[00:52.69]Versace hotel and I'm takin' the robes
[00:54.50]Seen 'em in person I'm seein' a ghost
[00:56.13]They told me relax 'cause they're takin' control
[00:57.86]Take all that s**t up with P and his bro
[00:59.44]I wish you the best let me know how it goes
[01:01.29]Wanna be free and I wanna let go
[01:02.96]We came around and you showed us the most
[01:04.50]I know so much s**t that I cannot expose
[01:06.30]I keep it inside and I laugh on my own
[01:08.04]Got all the tea and I'm hottin' it up
[01:09.54]I need a shade mansion a room's not enough
[01:11.22]You're droppin' some s**t but that s**t was a bust
[01:12.89]They got no direction they're followin' us
[01:14.75]I come from a city that they never touch
[01:16.44]Your man is a goofy and he could get rushed
[01:18.02]I can't name a rapper or girl that I trust
[01:19.63]I dream about turnin' these yutes into dust
[01:22.57]Aye
[01:34.23]Yeah
[01:35.03]You know how the paigon chit-chat goes
[01:36.75]I like Rs and Vs and Os
[01:38.46]I don't really play no tic-tac-toe
[01:40.15]Been with Roxx through highs and lows
[01:41.80]We seen man last night they froze
[01:43.52]Wasn't no cameras wasn't no pose
[01:45.22]Just like that one time at Nobu
[01:47.00]Good thing man weren't pullin' out phones
[01:48.61]Think you know me that's not true
[01:50.32]We got ties in West End too
[01:51.99]She came over and she got slewed
[01:53.67]Throwin' up six like man had flu
[01:55.36]I got way too big off Views
[01:57.02]Back to the basics I won't lose
[01:58.74]They wanna link when they got no chunes
[02:00.43]They too worried 'bout sellin' out shoes
[02:02.08]I don't give a f**k about jeans and crep
[02:03.68]Or goin' to Milan or goin' to the Met
[02:05.51]I just wanna make these songs for the set
[02:07.15]I just wanna load that and let that wet
[02:08.87]I got so much tings in the stash
[02:10.49]Fold up anyone dun that clash
[02:12.26]Got no sense like Jizzle and shh
[02:13.95]Big and bad like leader and shh
[02:15.69]Can't do love 'cause they get too attached
[02:17.32]Phone get broke and whip get scratched
[02:18.98]I'ma just take my knots in cash
[02:20.68]They can never tie me down that's facts
[02:22.37]All that bark but we know he's a cat
[02:24.12]I don't really like goin' tit for tat
[02:25.78]I'ma just come like tat-tat-tat
[02:27.42]I'ma just end that there that's that
data.trans:
[ti:Behind Barz (Bonus(Explicit))]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Top Boy (A Selection of Music Inspired by the Series)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:11.28]//
[00:22.57]听着
[00:27.57]你知道那些小人都在说些什么闲言碎语吧
[00:29.24]我喜欢我的团队和我的兄弟
[00:30.92]我不想跟你们扯来扯去
[00:32.59]一直以来都和Chubbs同甘共苦
[00:34.25]昨晚那些人 见到我们动都不敢动
[00:35.97]但没有相机对着他们 不需要他们摆姿势
[00:37.66]就像在柯契拉音乐晚会上的那一回
[00:39.37]还好没人掏手机把当时的画面录下来
[00:41.01]待在多伦多 心中惆怅不已
[00:42.72]有人开始找茬 重提过去的事情
[00:44.43]除了街头生意 他们什么都做
[00:46.07]一旦遇到麻烦 他们就不见了踪影
[00:47.77]我没时间搭理那些废人的玩笑
[00:49.45]如果我亲身参与 那就是我的私事
[00:51.12]对OVO团队无比忠诚 因为我许下了诺言
[00:52.69]住了范思哲酒店 带走了一件浴袍
[00:54.50]那些人我见过 他们就像行尸走肉
[00:56.13]朋友叫我放轻松 因为他们可以掌控一切
[00:57.86]不要搭理那些没有意义的恩怨情仇
[00:59.44]我希望你好好的 告诉我事情发展成什么样了
[01:01.29]想要自由 我想要放手
[01:02.96]我们来到这里 你为我们付出了很多
[01:04.50]我知道太多不能泄露的事情
[01:06.30]我把它们藏在心里 自己一个人笑
[01:08.04]有各种猛料 我正在酝酿
[01:09.54]我需要一座豪宅 一个房间是不够的的
[01:11.22]你要发布新专辑 但那玩意儿没什么了不起的
[01:12.89]他们找不到方向 他们就跟着我们走
[01:14.75]我家乡的人 谁都不敢惹
[01:16.44]你的人是个蠢货 很可能会被教训
[01:18.02]我不知道哪个说唱歌手或者女孩值得信任
[01:19.63]我梦想着让这些家伙灰飞烟灭
[01:22.57]//
[01:34.23]//
[01:35.03]你知道那些小人都在说些什么闲言碎语吧
[01:36.75]我喜欢我的团队和我的兄弟
[01:38.46]我不想跟你们扯来扯去
[01:40.15]一直以来都和Jonny Roxx同甘共苦
[01:41.80]昨晚那些人 见到我们动都不敢动
[01:43.52]但没有相机对着他们 不需要他们摆姿势
[01:45.22]就像在松久信幸餐厅那一回
[01:47.00]还好没人掏手机把当时的画面录下来
[01:48.61]你以为了解我 那些都不是真的
[01:50.32]我在伦敦西区也有熟人
[01:51.99]她来到这里 晕头转向
[01:53.67]摆出数字六的手势 就像得了流行感冒
[01:55.36]《Views》这张专辑让我无比膨胀
[01:57.02]回到根本的问题 我不会输
[01:58.74]他们时运不济的时候 就想找人帮帮忙
[02:00.43]他们整天牵挂着怎么卖鞋
[02:02.08]我根本不在乎服装之类的东西
[02:03.68]也不稀罕参加什么时装秀
[02:05.51]我只想认认真真地做音乐
[02:07.15]我只想掏出枪来 干掉那些敌人
[02:08.87]我有好多事情要忙
[02:10.49]来一场决斗 战无不胜
[02:12.26]没有Jizzle那样的意识
[02:13.95]就像领袖一样强大凶狠
[02:15.69]不能谈恋爱 因为她们太依恋我了
[02:17.32]手机坏了 车也刮花了
[02:18.98]我要赚白花花的钞票
[02:20.68]他们绝不可能控制我 这是事实
[02:22.37]气势汹汹的模样 实际上是个懦夫
[02:24.12]我不太喜欢以牙还牙 针锋相对
[02:25.78]我直接掏枪 砰砰砰
[02:27.42]把问题就这样解决掉
